pages.text: 14|43|ve daudate hue apane sir oopar kiye hue honge, unakee aankhen unakee or nahin phirengee aur unake dil gire[1] hue honge.

14|44|(he nabee!) aap logon ko us din se daraayen, jab unapar yaatana aa jaayegee. to atyaachaaree kahengeh hamaare paalanahaar! hamen kuchh samay tak avasar de, ham teree baat (aamantran) sveekaar kar lenge aur rasoolon ka anusaran karenge, kya tum vahee nahin ho, jo isase pahale shapath le rahe the ki hamaara patan hona hee nahin hai

14|45|jabaki tum unheen kee bastiyon mein base ho, jinhonne apane oopar atyaachaar kiya aur tumhaare lie ujaagar ho gaya hai ki hamane unake saath kya kiya? aur hamane tumhen bahut-se udaaharan bhee diye hain.
14|46|aur unhonne apana shadyantr rach liya tatha unaka shadyantr allaah ke paas[1] hai aur unaka shadyantr aisa nahin tha ki usase parvat tal jaayen.
14|47|atah kadaapi ye na samajhen ki allaah apane rasoolon se kiya vachan bhang karane vaala hai, vaastav mein, allaah prabhutvashaalee, badala lene vaala hai.
14|48|jis din ye dharatee doosaree dharatee se tatha aakaash badal diye jaayenge aur sab allaah ke samaksh[1] upasthit honge, jo akela prabhutvashaalee hai.
14|49|aur aap us din aparaadhiyon ko zanjeeron mein jakade hue dekhenge.
14|50|unake vastr taarakol ke honge aur unake mukhon par agni chhaayee hogee.
14|51|taaki allaah pratyek praanee ko, usake kiye ka badala de. nihsandeh allaah sheeghr haî€¼eesaab lene vaala hai.
14|52|ye manushyon ke lie ek sandesh hai aur taaki isake dvaara unhen saavadhaan kiya jaaye aur taaki ve jaan len ki vahee ek saty poojy hai aur taaki matimaan log shiksha grahan karen.
